name: crm
description: Frappe CRM helps you work, not slow you down. Open-source, intuitive, and free from extra costs.
author: Frappe Technologies Pvt. Ltd.

scripts.upgrade-frappeui: cd frontend && yarn add frappe-ui@latest && cd ..
scripts.release:publish: standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin develop && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes
scripts.release:publish:patch: standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags origin develop && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes
scripts.release:publish:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin develop && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes
scripts.release:publish:major: standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin develop && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes
